Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- Status: OK
07.03.2012 SH SCR17186 BXA015A Enabled writing of TLIT_TYPEOFCHARGE <> 21 rows to XML
02.02.2010 SH SCR15271 Replaced GSET_ID(155) handling with GB036 to retrieve
the VAT number client
02.04.2007 AK SCR11907 added special handling for country code 'DT' and 'ZZ'
02.04.2007 AK SCR11907 added sub totals after tax and delimiters lines
25.04.2006 SH SCR10823 BXA015A Added special handling for TLIT_TYPEOFCHARGE=21
if GSET_YESNO= Y (GSET_ID = 200)
04.04.2006 SH SCR10790 BXA018B Added <header_id>
26.10.2005 SH SCR9362 BXA012D Added new tag <client_vat_number>
01.07.2005 SH SCR8478 Removed XML reserved characters for DEBC_DEBC
21.09.2004 SH SCR7015 BXA015B Added "Specification finance limit observation
costs" if TLIT_TYPEOFCHARGE = 23
19.08.2004 SH SCR6860 Added new tags <client_name_ext> until <client_country>
13.07.2004 SH SCR6633 BXA015 Header Added two new fields <footer_id> and
01.04.2004 SH SCR5854 Added new field TLIT_JOURNALNO, uses to obtain REPA
24.03.2004 SH SCR5488 Renamed BXA015_DEV to BXA015
22.03.2004 SH SCR5488 Fixed bug where the total tax amounts has to be written
to report; removed call to BPH107
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
-- Use to generate XML in client language
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- Store userlanguage, XML files have to be produced in client language, will be
-- dynamically changed in the child task, where CLNT will be obtained
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Get client language, uses to generate XML file in client language
-- Get REPA_SPECIALDELIVERY, uses as argument for BXA900
-- Totals uses in BXA015A
-- XML - Translations
-- Special triggers
-- Reset virtuals
-- Set virtuals
-- Switch to client language in which the XML file has to be produced
-- XML - Translations
-- Write BXA015 Header to XML
-- BXA015 Build XML HEADER
-- BXA015A Write total lines for every distinct country where
TLIT_TYPEOFCHARGE = 21
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
-- BXA015A Write tax totals to XML if sum TLIT_TAX <> 0
... Delimiter line
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
... Commission Subtotal line
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
... Tax total row
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
... Delimiter line
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
... Total limit costs
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
-- BXA015B Write Limit costs / detail
-- Build final XML file
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Delete temporary XML files
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Switch system languag back from client language to user language
-- Reset virtuals
-- Calculate totals for BXA015A, has to be written to XML in G.S. TLIT_CLIENT
-- BXA015A Prepare text string regarding to TLIT_TYPEOFCHARGE
... if filled write to XML
-- Append "partial XML Total file" to "XML Totals file"
-- Update TLIT row, to prevent multiple XML files for the same TLIT rows
-- Reset variables
... translate country name
There is no transtaltion (and also sould not be) in the CODE_DICTIONARY
for country code 'DT'. so we set hard coded mlstrans('DOM-TOM' ) for this code
There is no transtaltion (and also sould not be) in the CODE_DICTIONARY
for country code 'ZZ'. so we set hard coded mlstrans('OTHER COUNTRIES')
for this code (SCR 11907 note from 02.05.2007)
... TLID_COMMISSION of any selected TLID row
-- Reset virtuals
-- Prepare text string regarding to TLID_TYPEOFCHARGE
-- 1. Write one blank line to XML
-- 2. Write description of type of charge
-- Reset virtuals

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Specification own judgement limit prolongation costs')
